    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>238</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Spelling Quiz - Try Your Luck!</string>
            <string language="es">El cuestionario sobre el deletreo - ¡Prueba tu suerte!</string>
            <string language="ga">An Scrúdú Litriúcháin – Bain Triail As!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Rechtschreibung-Quiz - Versuchen Sie Ihr 
Glück!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Jeu D'Épellation - Essayez Votre Chance !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Quiz Da Soletração - Tente Sua Sorte!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Quiz Di Ortografia - Provi La Vostra Fortuna!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο διαγωνισμός γνώσεων ορθογραφίας - δοκιμάστε την 
τύχη σας!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Focus on your spelling and try to improve it if necessary.</string>
            <string language="es">Se centra en tus habilidades para deletrear e intenta mejorarlas si es necesario.</string>
            <string language="ga">Dírigh ar do litriú agus déan iarracht e a fheabhsú más gá.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzentrieren Sie auf Ihre Rechtschreibung und Versuch, um
ihn wenn notwendig zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concentrez sur votre épellation et essai pour 
l'améliorer au besoin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Focalize em suas soletração e tentativa para melhorá-la
se necessário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metta a fuoco sulla vostre ortografia e prova per 
migliorarlo se necessario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εστίαση στην ορθογραφία σας και προσπαθεί να το 
βελτιώσει εάν είναι απαραίτητο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
